thread.title: Obama urges Kenya to use past to guide future
thread.title_full: Obama urges Kenya to use past to guide future

author: kballuck@thehill.com (The Hill staff)
title: Obama urges Kenya to use past to guide future
text:
Obama urges Kenya to use past to guide future By The Hill staff - 07/26/15 07:50 AM EDT 
President Barack Obama on Sunday pressed the nation of his father’s birth to root out corruption, treat women and minorities as equal citizens, and take responsibility for its own future.
